Flow.description: Email to RMs based on Opportunity Owner Role when an opportunity is moved.

value.stringValue: CONTAINS([Opportunity].Opportunity_Owner_Role__c, "QLD") && [Opportunity].Record_Type__c = "Licence Fee" && ([Opportunity].OO_Forecast__c || [Opportunity].Include_in_Forecast__c ) && (ISCHANGED([Opportunity].StageName ) || ISCHANGED([Opportunity].CloseDate ) || ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Project_Start_Date__c) || ISCHANGED([Opportunity].Licence_Model__c)) && (TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) = "3 - Proposal" || TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) = "4 - Shortlisted" || TEXT([Opportunity].StageName) = "5 - Preferred")

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: CONTAINS({!myVariable_current.Opportunity_Owner_Role__c}, "QLD") && {!myVariable_current.Record_Type__c} = "Licence Fee" && ({!myVariable_current.OO_Forecast__c} || {!myVariable_current.Include_in_Forecast__c} ) && (ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.StageName} ) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.CloseDate} ) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Project_Start_Date__c}) || ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Licence_Model__c})) && (TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) = "3 - Proposal" || TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) = "4 - Shortlisted" || TEXT({!myVariable_current.StageName}) = "5 - Preferred")
